Please carefully review your information and check for any errors. Make sure to fill in any missing info, which can be found on your ticket. Feel free to contact us or the court for help.

Citation Information

If you have a citation number AND a case or docket number, we suggest using the case or docket number.

Important!

It is your responsibility to make sure you are eligible for traffic school. We will be submitting your course results to the DMV and Court, but the submission may not be accepted if you have unpaid court fees or errors in your information. If you require us to RESUBMIT your test results again, we will assess a $6.99 fee to reissue your certificate and resubmit your course results.
